channel.title: Shops on Cocina 214
channel.description: Recent content in Shops on Cocina 214

item.title: Gift Card ($25)
item.description: Cocina 214 Gift Cards can be purchased for your friends and family in varying amounts. Gift cards can be redeemed at our Winter Park or Daytona Beach locations. We do not ship any orders on Saturdays or Sundays. In addition, Cocina 214 will be closed in observance of the holidays: New Year’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day and will not process orders on these days. Please note that depending on when these holidays fall throughout the year we may be closed additional days other than those listed.

item.title: I Hate Running but I Love Tacos T-Shirt (BLACK)
item.description: The back of this Limited Edition BLACK Cocina shirt features a 9.5” silk screened reproduction of the label’s character dial. The front is a centered chest print featuring the saying “I hate running but I love tacos”. We do not ship any orders on Saturdays or Sundays. In addition, Cocina 214 will be closed in observance of the holidays: New Year’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day and will not process orders on these days.
